weekly_top_story.headline: Senate Passes Modified Government Funding Minibus Including Full FY 2026 HHS Funding Amid Partial Shutdown
weekly_top_story.summary: The Senate approved a modified version of H.R. 7148 providing full fiscal year 2026 funding for HHS and health extenders, now awaiting House approval to end the partial government shutdown affecting healthcare operations.

stories.headline: House Rules Committee Meets Today on Senate-Modified Government Funding Bill as Partial Shutdown Continues
stories.summary: The House Rules Committee is convening to advance Senate changes to H.R. 7148 for full FY 2026 HHS funding, with a floor vote expected tomorrow to resolve the ongoing partial shutdown impacting HHS services.

stories.headline: Healthcare, Life Sciences Leaders Expect More Mergers in 2026 Despite Uncertain Landscape
stories.summary: A KPMG survey reveals most healthcare and life sciences executives anticipate increased M&A activity in 2026, signaling optimism and potential consolidation amid economic uncertainties.
